content: Common shared values create a culture. Having core values fit would create an inclusive culture. It is importnat to understand that your “declared values” should reflect your actual values, otherwise it would not work. The same approach works for the personal life. For example, no matter how many times I would try to convince myself that good health is one of my values — it would not work. Cause it is not. So, no approaches which use good health as a source of motivation would not work for me. :)
